values: If someone is lively, they have a lot of energy.
Jennifer is very lively: she’s always running and playing.
adj. 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
adj. 充满活力的, 活泼的, 轻快的逼真的, 醒目的剧烈的, 狂暴的比较级:livelier, liveliest副 词:livelily
